commands.name: todo-done
commands.description: marks a 'to-do' as done in the current log book

environment variables.name: LOGBOOKSINDEX
environment variables.description: the log books index file currently in use

commands.name: tmuxblastwave
commands.description: brings up blastwave's irc channel in weechat using a tmux pane

commands.name: timeofday
commands.description: echoes Morning, Afternoon or evening depending on the current hour

commands.name: picedit
commands.description: convert front end to carry out commonly used picture edits

functions.name: foo
functions.description: bash completion example function

functions.name: tile
functions.description: time supplied image file according to the second (x) and third (y) arguments

functions.name: overlay
functions.description: removes the background of the given image file and makes it transparent for use on top of a video or live stream

functions.name: fbprofilepic
functions.description: sizes the given picture file according to th ecurrent facebook profile picture size requirements

functions.name: fbbannerpic
functions.description: sizes the given picutre file accoding to the current facebook banner picture size requirements

functions.name: twitchprofilepic
functions.description: sizes the given picture file according to the current twitter profile picture size requirements

functions.name: twitchbannerpic
functions.description: sizes the given picture file to the current twitch banner picture size requirements

functions.name: twitterbannerpic
functions.description: sizes the gen picture file to the crrent twitter banner picture size requirements

functions.name: twitterprofilepic
functions.description: sizes the given picture file to the current twitter profile picture size requirements

functions.name: ytprofilepic
functions.description: sizes the gien picture file to the current youtube profile picture size requirements

functions.name: ytbannerpic
functions.description: sizes the given picture file to the current youtube banner picture size requirements

functions.name: allbanners
functions.description: takes the supplied picture file and passes it to all of the banner picture sizing functions

functions.name: shadowannotate
functions.description: adds added up to two lines of shadowed text (a2 line 1, a3 line 2) to the supplied picture file (a1) using the supplied font (a4) and font size(a5) in a given position (a6) using a given stroke colour (a7) and fill colour (a8) to a given output filename (a9)

functions.name: bubbletext
functions.description: create a bubble text image using the supplied text (a1), the font (a2), the font size (a3), the fill colour (a4), the line colour (a5) and outputs to the filename given in a6

functions.name: hozappend
functions.description: appends two picture files horizontally, a1 left picture, a2 right picture, output filename a3

functions.name: vertappend
functions.description: appends to picture file vertically, a1 top imange, a2 bottom images, a3 output filename

functions.name: rb-radial-gradient
functions.description: creates a radial gradient suitable for use on redbubble, a1 colour 1, a2 colour 2

functions.name: rb-tile
functions.description: tiles an image suitable for use on redbubble, a1 filename, output file ...-rb-tiled.png

functions.name: commands
functions.description: bash tab completion function

commands.name: mpvnico
commands.description: brings up nico stream either on genunix or twitch (a1)

commands.name: mpvlana_lux
commands.description: brings up lana_lux's twitch stream using mpvastream
